eventServices.title: Birthday Parties
eventServices.details: We specialize in creating memorable and fun birthday parties for people of all ages. From themed decorations to entertainment and delicious cakes, we ensure that every birthday celebration is a blast!

eventPlanningDetails.themeOptions: Customized themes to match your preferences
eventPlanningDetails.catering: Delicious menus tailored to your tastes
eventPlanningDetails.photography: Professional photographers to capture the moments

eventServices.title: Weddings
eventServices.details: Your wedding day is one of the most important events of your life. We offer comprehensive wedding planning services, from venue selection to catering and everything in between, to make your big day truly special.

eventPlanningDetails.venue: Elegant wedding venues of your choice
eventPlanningDetails.themeOptions: Customized wedding themes and color schemes

eventServices.title: Anniversary Parties
eventServices.details: Celebrate your love and commitment with an anniversary party that reflects your journey together. We create romantic and personalized anniversary celebrations filled with love and nostalgia.

eventPlanningDetails.themeOptions: Personalized themes to match your love story
eventPlanningDetails.photography: Professional photographers to capture the romantic moments

eventServices.title: Engagement Parties
eventServices.details: Announce your engagement with style and elegance. Our engagement party planning services ensure that your event is a reflection of your love story and sets the tone for your upcoming wedding.

eventPlanningDetails.themeOptions: Engagement themes that capture your romance
eventPlanningDetails.photography: Professional photographers to capture your special moments

eventServices.title: Baby Showers
eventServices.details: Welcoming a new member to the family is a joyous occasion. We design baby showers that are both cute and practical, with adorable decorations, games, and thoughtful gifts for the parents-to-be.

eventPlanningDetails.catering: Baby shower brunch or afternoon tea
eventPlanningDetails.photography: Professional photographers to capture the baby bump moments

eventServices.title: Retirement Parties
eventServices.details: Celebrate the end of a successful career with a retirement party that honors the retiree's achievements and contributions. We create retirement celebrations that are meaningful and memorable.

eventPlanningDetails.venue: Elegant venues with a touch of nostalgia
eventPlanningDetails.themeOptions: Retirement themes reflecting the retiree's passions
eventPlanningDetails.photography: Professional photographers to capture the retirement moments
